home.headline: Design engineer and builder
home.subline: I'm Jawn, a software engineer at VKM, passionate about crafting elegant solutions to complex problems, contributing to open-source, and building stunning websites with seamless user experiences.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm Jawn, a Nigerian software engineer working at VKM. I enjoy finding smart ways to solve tough problems with software. My work involves designing systems that can handle a lot of users, improving backend performance, and creating strong APIs. I also focus on making sure the software runs smoothly and is easy for people to use. I love contributing to open-source projects and taking on challenges that require deep thinking and careful planning.

FLY.achievements: Built and maintained a robust design system to ensure consistency and reusability across multiple applications.;Designed and developed scalable management systems for internal and external stakeholders.;Automated repetitive tasks, improving workflow efficiency and reducing manual effort.;

EazyBillz.achievements: Developed a design system that unified the brand across multiple platforms, improving design consistency by 40%.;Led a cross-functional team to launch a new product line, contributing to a 15% increase in overall company revenue.

Build the Future.description: Studied online marketing and personal branding.

Figma.description: Able to prototype in Figma with Once UI with unnatural speed.

Nextjs.description: Building next gen apps with Next.js + Once UI + Supabase.
